ivardefs.name: country_
ivardefs.desc: The country in which the marketing authorization has been granted.

ivardefs.name: dataExclusivityPeriod
ivardefs.desc: A period of time after authorization before generic product applicatiosn can be submitted.

ivardefs.name: dateOfFirstAuthorization
ivardefs.desc: The date when the first authorization was granted by a Medicines Regulatory Agency.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifier for the marketing authorization, as assigned by a regulator.

ivardefs.name: internationalBirthDate
ivardefs.desc: Date of first marketing authorization for a company's new medicinal product in any country in the World.

ivardefs.name: jurisdictionalAuthorization_
ivardefs.desc: Authorization in areas within a country.

ivardefs.name: legalBasis
ivardefs.desc: The legal framework against which this authorization is granted.

ivardefs.name: procedure
ivardefs.desc: The regulatory procedure for granting or amending a marketing authorization.

ivardefs.name: restoreDate
ivardefs.desc: The date when a suspended the marketing or the marketing authorization of the product is anticipated to be restored.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the marketing authorization.

ivardefs.name: statusDate
ivardefs.desc: The date at which the given status has become applicable.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The medicinal product that is being authorized.

ivardefs.name: validityPeriod
ivardefs.desc: The beginning of the time period in which the marketing authorization is in the specific status shall be specified A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format.

properties.desc: The regulatory authorization of a medicinal product.
